content: He then gives the crew two choices: join them or be sunk right there and then. The only choice the Straw Hats have is to run and charge straight toward Fish-Man Island with Coup de Burst. Hammond once again asks if Luffy will join him, and Luffy, without a care in the world, rejects Hammond just as the preparations for the Coup de Burst are set. Franky activates it, and the ship blasts off to Fish-Man Island. They make it in, but the coating of the Sunny wears off, and they all get separated after the ship falls into a current.
